0000110000000110  //LDA R0,00,6 [R0=6]
0000100000010000  //STR R0,00,16 [Memory16=6]
1000010100010000  //LDX x1,00,16 [X1=6]
0000111100000111  //LDA R3,00,7 [R3=7]
0000101100010100  //STR R3,00,20 [Memory20=7]
0000111000000001  //LDA R2,00,1 [R2=1]
0000101000000111  //STR R2,00,7 [Memory7=1]
0000010101101110  //LDR R1,X1,14,I [R1=1]
1000100100011001  //STX X1,00,25 [Memory25=6]
0001000100010100  //AMR R1,00,20 [R1=8]
0001011000010100 //SMR R2,00,20 [R2=-6]
0001101000000000 //AIR R2,00,0 [R2=-6]
0001110000011111 //SIR R0,00,31 [R0=-25]
